article:
The dependencies Window of an element shows all the elements which are associated with this element.
The dependencies for a Class show:
The Alias Classes
The Classes which are at the other end of an object property relation of this Class
The data properties associated with the Class
The object properties associated with the Class, for the domain or the range of the property
The individuals associated with the Class
The dependencies for a Data property show:
The Classes associated with the domain of the property
The dependencies for an Object property show:
The Classes associated with the domain of the property
The Classes associated with the range of the property
The dependencies for an Individual show:
The Classes associated with the Individual
